message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product for $1,100,000. I think it's a great deal, considering its value to you is $1,000,000. Let me know if you're interested!

Alice, your offer is tempting, but I'm looking to pay closer to my maximum value. I'm willing to offer $950,000 for the product.  This reflects the value to me and leaves room for both of us to come to a fair agreement.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices. I'm offering the product to you for $1,025,000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects the value of the product to me. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
